sentences.en: A train of antiquated coaches was waiting for us at the siding.
sentences.cn: 一列陈旧的火车在侧线上等着我们.

sentences.en: He laid her on an antiquated lounge.
sentences.cn: 他把她放在一张破旧的躺椅上.

sentences.en: Her uncle is antiquated in ideas.
sentences.cn: 她叔父的思想陈旧保守.

sentences.en: Many factories are so antiquated they are not worth saving.
sentences.cn: 很多工厂过于陈旧落后，已不值得挽救。

sentences.en: Natural Stones Including Marble, Travertine, Limestone, Onyx Stones and Antiquated Mosaic Tiles.
sentences.cn: 天然的石头包括大理石, 石灰华, 石灰石, 镐玛脑石头和旧式的摩西砖瓦.

sentences.en: Not only that. His methods are antiquated.
sentences.cn: 不仅如此. 他的方法也是过时的.

sentences.en: Of course, the security rendered by such an antiquated algorithm is nil.
sentences.cn: 当然, 这过时的算法提供的安全是毫无价值的.

sentences.en: The butler was almost invisible in the stream of an antiquated geyser.
sentences.cn: 在这座古老的热水锅炉产生的水蒸汽中隐隐约约可以看到那个男仆的影子.

sentences.en: The church, the ruin, the antiquated graves, had equal claims upon a stranger's thoughts.
sentences.cn: 教堂, 废墟, 古老的坟墓均能使陌生人思绪万千.

sentences.en: The kitchen now is a dark cavern, with an antiquated black stove in a corner.
sentences.cn: 厨房现在黑洞洞的，角落里有只破旧的黑色炉子。

sentences.en: The method is already slightly antiquated.
sentences.cn: 这个办法现在已经有点过时了.

sentences.en: Therefore in the 1950's and 1960's, the baby boom hit an antiquated and inadequate school system.
sentences.cn: 因此,在五六十年代, 生育高峰冲击着陈旧而不完备的学校体系.

sentences.en: They attempted in vain to modernise these antiquated industries.
sentences.cn: 他们企图使这些陈旧的工业现代化,结果劳而无功.

sentences.en: This was the antiquated elegance of his day.
sentences.cn: 这是他那时代古老的高贵气派.

sentences.en: Totem is one of the very antiquated primitive religion forms.
sentences.cn: 图腾是一种古老的原始宗教形式.

words.tran_cn: 废弃；使…过时；使…具有古旧形式或风格
使古旧；废弃（antiquate的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 过时的，陈旧的，老式的，古色古香的，有古风的，年老的
trans.tran_en: old-fashioned and not suitable for modern needs or conditions – used to show disapproval

trans.tran_cn: 使古旧，废弃（antiquate的过去式和过去分词）
